page.title: 14Brookleigh Riding Centre RHS
page.content: The Riding Centre was opened in June {1972}and{Mr. and Mrs. Thompson}teach the pupils. They have one{helper}with them. There are two parts to the centre. There is an{indoor}riding school and an{outdoor}one. They have {10 horses.}They decided to have it in {Eppleby}because there were facilities available. Mrs Thompson has approximately{100} {pupils.}The age range is 4 to 65. Some of them bring their own horses. They have riding, jumping and cross country. They have gymkhanas, moorland rides and summer horseshow events. Mrs. Thompson has a{shop}which sells riding hats, coats, trousers and blouses.
